DOC.brief_summary: A prospective study evaluate safety efficacy piggyback sulcoflex toric intraocular lens pseudophakic patient correct refractive error follow corneal transplantation
DOC.brief_title: Piggyback Sulcoflex Toric IOL Correcting Refractive Error Following Corneal Transplantation
DOC.criteria: corneal transplantation refractive error cataract removal intraocular lens implantation ophthalmologic disorder limit vision include glaucoma , AMD , profound amblyopia
